BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO PISPR_GC_MEET_TRN (GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,STR_MEETING_ID, NUM_COMM_ID, DT_MEETING, STR_CITY_OR_PLACE, STR_VENUE, STR_PURPOSE, STR_REASON_FOR_CANCEL, DT_NEXT_MEETING, STR_STATUS, GDT_EFFECT_DATE, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

INSERT INTO PISPR_GC_MEET_DTL (GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,STR_MEETING_ID, STR_MEM_SEQ_NO, STR_MEM_INFORMED_BY, STR_LETTER_NO, DT_LETTER_DATE, DT_ON_DATE,STR_STATUS, GDT_EFFECT_DATE, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

INSERT INTO PISPR_GC_MEET_INCLUDE_DTL (GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,STR_MEETING_ID,STR_APPL_REQ_ID, STR_FILE_NAME, STR_FILE_NO, STR_ACTION_FILE_NAME, STR_STATUS, GDT_EFFECT_DATE, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

INSERT INTO PISPR_GC_MEETING_MAPPING (GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,STR_MEETING_ID,NUM_APPLICATION_ID, NUM_MODULE_ID, NUM_EVENT_STATUS, NUM_EVENT_SLNO, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE PISPR_GC_MEET_TRN T SET T.NUM_COMM_ID=?, T.DT_MEETING=?, T.STR_CITY_OR_PLACE=?, T.STR_VENUE=?, T.STR_PURPOSE=?, T.STR_REASON_FOR_CANCEL=?,T.DT_NEXT_MEETING=?,T.STR_STATUS=?, T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.STR_MEETING_ID=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? AND T.GNUM_ISVALID=1

INSERT INTO PISPR_GC_MEET_DTL (GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,STR_MEETING_ID, STR_MEM_SEQ_NO, STR_MEM_INFORMED_BY, STR_LETTER_NO, DT_LETTER_DATE, DT_ON_DATE, STR_STATUS, GDT_EFFECT_DATE, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

INSERT INTO PISPR_GC_MEET_INCLUDE_DTL (GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,STR_MEETING_ID, STR_APPL_REQ_ID, STR_FILE_NAME, STR_FILE_NO, STR_ACTION_FILE_NAME, STR_STATUS, GDT_EFFECT_DATE, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE PISPR_GC_MEETING_MAPPING T SET T.NUM_EVENT_STATUS=?, T.NUM_EVENT_SLNO=?, T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.STR_MEETING_ID=? AND T.NUM_APPLICATION_ID=? AND T.NUM_MODULE_ID=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? AND T.GNUM_ISVALID=1
DELETE FROM PISPR_GC_MEET_DTL T WHERE T.STR_MEETING_ID=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? AND GNUM_ISVALID=1
DELETE FROM PISPR_GC_MEET_INCLUDE_DTL T WHERE T.STR_MEETING_ID=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? AND GNUM_ISVALID=1
UPDATE PISPR_GC_MEET_TRN SET GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE STR_MEETING_ID=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? AND GNUM_ISVALID=1
UPDATE PISPR_GC_MEET_DTL SET GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE STR_MEETING_ID=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? AND GNUM_ISVALID=1
UPDATE PISPR_GC_MEET_INCLUDE_DTL SET GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE STR_MEETING_ID=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? AND GNUM_ISVALID=1
UPDATE PISPR_GC_MEETING_MAPPING SET GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE STR_MEETING_ID=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? AND GNUM_ISVALID=1 AND NUM_APPLICATION_ID=? AND NUM_MODULE_ID=?
